title: ASHRAE 205 RS0002 JSON Schema
description: A schema for ASHRAE 205 annex RS0002 Unitary AC

outdoor_unit_manufacturer.description: Name of the outdoor unit manufacturer

outdoor_unit_model_number.description: Model number of the outdoor unit

indoor_unit_manufacturer.description: Name of the indoor unit manufacturer

indoor_unit_model_number.description: Model number of the indoor unit

test_standard_year.description: Name and version of the AHRI test standard

manufacturer_data_source_version.description: Version of the software used to generate the AHRI rating and the performance maps

SEER.description: Seasonal Energy Efficiency Ratio as defined by AHRI 210/240

EER.description: Energy Efficiency Ratio (A) as defined by AHRI 210/240
EER.notes: The net efficiency (accounting for fan motor heat/power) at the AHRI 'A' operating conditions

capacity.description: Total cooling capacity (A) as defined by AHRI 210/240
capacity.notes: The net capacity (accounting for fan motor heat) at the AHRI 'A' operating conditions

rating_fan_power_per_flow.description: Power per air flow rate of the fan used in the AHRI 210/240 calculation of SEER and EER
rating_fan_power_per_flow.notes: Used for verification of the rated SEER value (see SEER calculation procedures in AHRI 210/240)

rating_reproducible_from_performance_dat.description: Whether this rating can be reproduced using the performance data in the representation
rating_reproducible_from_performance_dat.notes: Mark this field as yes if the rating values in this table can be reproduced using the performance data in the representation within the tolerance of the rating standard.

test_standard_year.description: Name and version of the AHRI test standard

manufacturer_data_source_version.description: Version of the software used to generate the AHRI rating and the performance maps

IEER.description: Integrated Energy Efficiency Ratio as defined by AHRI 340/360

EER.description: Energy Efficiency Ratio as defined by AHRI 340/360
EER.notes: Net efficiency accounts for fan motor heat/power

capacity.description: Total cooling capacity as defined by AHRI 340/360
capacity.notes: Net capacity accounts for fan motor heat

rating_fan_power_per_flow.description: Power per air flow rate of the indoor fan used in the AHRI 340/360 calculation of IEER and EER
rating_fan_power_per_flow.notes: Used for verification of the rated SEER value (see SEER calculation procedures in AHRI 340/360)

rating_reproducible_from_performance_dat.description: Whether this rating can be reproduced using the performance data in the representation
rating_reproducible_from_performance_dat.notes: Mark this field as yes if the rating values in this table can be reproduced using the performance data in the representation within the tolerance of the rating standard.

nominal_volumetric_air_flow_rate.description: Volumetric air flow rate leaving the indoor coil used to scale the flow ratios in the PerformanceMap
nominal_volumetric_air_flow_rate.notes: Generally, the volumetric air flow rate under full load conditions used in AHRI testing

cycling_degradation_coefficient.description: Cycling degradation coefficient (CD) as described in AHRI 210/240

performance_map_cooling.description: Data group describing cooling performance over a range of conditions

grid_variables_cooling.description: Data group defining the grid variables for cooling performance

outdoor_coil_entering_dry_bulb_temperatu.description: Dry bulb temperature of the air entering the outdoor coil

indoor_coil_entering_wet_bulb_temperatur.description: Wet bulb temperature of the air entering the indoor coil
indoor_coil_entering_wet_bulb_temperatur.notes: As measured immediately before entering the coil (i.e., after the fan in a blow-through configuration).

indoor_coil_entering_dry_bulb_temperatur.description: Dry bulb temperature of the air entering the indoor coil
indoor_coil_entering_dry_bulb_temperatur.notes: As measured immediately before entering the coil (i.e., after the fan in a blow-through configuration).

indoor_coil_volumetric_flow_ratio.description: Ratio of the volumetric air flow rate over the indoor coil to the nominal volumetric air flow rate
indoor_coil_volumetric_flow_ratio.notes: Expressed as ratio of actual (not standard) flow rate

compressor_sequence_number.description: Index indicating the relative order of the compressor speed/stage
compressor_sequence_number.notes: Expressed in order from initial stage/speed to final stage/speed

lookup_variables_cooling.description: Data group defining the lookup variables for cooling performance

gross_total_cooling_capacity.description: Total heat removed by the indoor coil
gross_total_cooling_capacity.notes: Does not account for heat added by the fan

gross_sensible_cooling_capacity.description: Sensible heat removed by the indoor coil
gross_sensible_cooling_capacity.notes: Does not account for heat added by the fan

gross_cooling_power.description: Gross power draw (of the outdoor unit)
gross_cooling_power.notes: Does not include power drawn by the indoor fan. Includes compressor, outdoor fan, and any auxiliary power used by the unit’s controls and any sump heater.

grid_variables_standby.description: Data group defining the grid variables for standby performance

outdoor_coil_environment_dry_bulb_temper.description: Dry bulb temperature of the air in the environment of the outdoor coil

lookup_variables_standby.description: Data group defining the grid variables for standby performance

gross_power.description: Gross power draw (of the outdoor unit)
gross_power.notes: Does not account for power drawn from the indoor fan. Includes compressor, outdoor fan, and any auxiliary power used by the unit’s controls, and any sump heater.
